entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person that Harry has a special connection with.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who is after Gregorovitch and Ollivander.

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: Gregorovitch is a foreign wandmaker who made Krum's wand.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a person who has a wand made by Gregorovitch and thinks he is brilliant.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: Ollivander is a wandmaker who is locked up by Voldemort.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who has a special connection with Dumbledore and is trying to understand why Voldemort is after Gregorovitch.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who questions Harry about Voldemort's motives.

relationships.description: Harry has a special connection with Dumbledore.
Harry is trying to understand why Voldemort is after Gregorovitch.
